properties.address: Wiltshire Council County, Corsham, Wiltshire SN13 8NT
properties.description: Spaces to sit and keep warm. • Free access to Wi-Fi and free computer access with a Library membership • Places to charge your devices • Signposting to advice and support • Check out regular groups, activities and events To find out more about what we offer, visit www.wiltshire.gov.uk/libraries. Library membership is free - join online or visit your local library to sign up.
properties.title: Box Library

properties.address: The Parade, Box, Nr Corsham, Wiltshire SN18 8NX
properties.description: Individual comfy chairs, space is heated to 18 degrees, tea, coffee and biccies with hot soup on alternate Thursdays. 9.30 to noon or 14:30 on Thursdays: Hearty soup lunches on alternate Thursdays. Services on 2nd,3rd & 4th Sundays, Check the website for dates
properties.title: Box Methodist Church

properties.address: 88 Station Road, Yate, South Glos BS37 4PH
properties.description: We are a community run cafe open Wednesday's between 1pm and 3pm. All are welcome. We serve hot drinks and cake, and soup and a roll during the colder months. There are puzzles and games for any children who visit and you are welcome to borrow a book from our little library shelves. We regularly have folk sharing skills, for example, during the last few months we have painted rocks, made Christmas decorations, and learned how to make some stunning mosaics. We've also had a local choir visit and have other exciting things planned.
properties.title: Candle Community Cafe

properties.address: Cepen Lodge Care Home, Chippenham, Wiltshire SN14 6UZ
properties.description: FREE Coffee, Cake and Friendly Chats! At Cepen Lodge care home we know the importance of supporting our local community, which is why we open our doors daily to those looking for a warm and welcoming place to visit. Our community café is located on our ground floor reception area, which is fully accessible for wheelchair users. We’re a dementia friendly home who understand the need for carers, and their loved ones to have a safe space to visit, one where all facilities are available for use. Come along and enjoy a complimentary hot drink, and slice of our chefs’ homemade ‘cake of the day’. There’s no need to book, simply pop in anytime between 9am – 5pm daily. There’s always someone friendly to chat to at Cepen Lodge care home and we very much look forward to welcoming you for light refreshment in the comfort, and warmth of our beautiful home.
properties.title: Cepen Lodge Community Cafe

properties.address: Cepen Lodge Care Home, Chippenham, Wiltshire SN14 6UZ
properties.description: At Cepen Lodge care home we know the importance of supporting our local community, which is why we open our doors daily to those looking for a warm and welcoming place to visit. We’re a dementia friendly home who understand the need for carers, and their loved ones to have a safe space to visit, one where all facilities are available for use. Come along and enjoy a complimentary hot drink and slice of our chefs’ homemade 'cake of the day'. There’s always someone friendly to chat to at Cepen Lodge care home. There’s no need to book, simply pop in anytime between 9am – 5pm daily. We look forward to welcoming you for light refreshments in the comfort and warmth of our beautiful home.

properties.address: Marshfield Community Centre, Chippenham, South Gloucestershire SN14 8NZ
properties.description: this community centre opens on a Monday and Thursday from 1.30-4pm. We provide warm and cold drinks, biscuits and cake. We play many different games, some at tables for example dominoes, rummicub, scrabble. We have colouring books, we knit and crochet. We have regular film afternoons, pickle ball, table tennis. Or Just a space to relax and chat.
properties.title: Marshfield Community Friends

properties.address: Sheldon Road Methodist Church, Audley Road, CHIPPENHAM, Wiltshire SN14 0DU
properties.title: Sheldon Road Methodist Church

properties.description: Everyone welcome we provide a warm welcome to anyone looking for somewhere to spend some time with others in a warm and friendly environment. We don't charge for our hot drinks and we also serve fresh homemade soup and a roll.
properties.title: souper friday

properties.address: Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church, Chipping Sodbury, South Gloucestershire BS37 6AH
properties.description: The Oasis at Chipping Sodbury Baptist Church (CSBC) is a community wellbeing space where everyone is welcome. Come in for a cuppa and a chat, share a hobby, join an activity and perhaps make a new friend. A range of activities and groups are available (some run outside of The Oasis core hours of 10am to 2pm) or just feel free to come and enjoy our safe space. You can be sure of a warm welcome. A separate area allows space for quiet prayer or reflection for those who want it. Please see our website for more details, including times of activities and groups. NB The Oasis is closed on Bank Holidays and between Christmas and New Year.
properties.title: The Oasis at CSBC
